entry.title: animate-css-grid
entry.content:
animate-css-gird

Easy transitions for CSS Grid.

FLIP animation applied on CSS grids with the help of MutationObserver that activates when the grid or one of its children adds or loses a class or element.

Get it: npm install animate-css-grid

Sample usage:

```js import { wrapGrid } from animateCSSGrid

const grid = document.querySelector(".grid"); const config = { // int: default is 0 ms stagger: 100, // int: default is 250 ms duration: 500 // string: default is 'easeInOut' easing: 'backInOut' };

wrapGrid(grid, config); ```
